e21.PPMS.loader module¶

class e21.PPMS.loader.Loader(**kw)[source]¶

Bases: object

A ppms file loader.

E.g. loading a susceptibility measurement:

>>>from e21.sweet16 import Loader
>>>s16 = Loader(mode='susceptibility')
>>>measurement = s16('path/to/susceptibility_measurement.dat')
CREATOR = {'susceptibility': <function create at 0x2ab1e8332c08>, 'transport': <function create at 0x2ab1e8304ed8>}¶
parse(path)[source]¶

A PPMS Data Parser.

Ignores ppms header. Converts empty data points to nan. Conservses all data. Returns data dictionary and params dictionary.

e21.PPMS.susceptibility.check_empty_files(filelist)[source]¶

Checks for empty files in list of files. Empty files are files containing only header lines. input: filelist output: filelist, list of non-empty files
